entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:06 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 03:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -34.4°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -38.4°C
Wind: SSW 36 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
